children.string: [Minjung Theology as a Dialogue Bridge? The Crucified People of Asia and Their Struggle for Subjectivity](https://politicaltheology.com/minjung-theology-as-a-dialogue-bridge-the-crucified-people-of-asia-and-their-struggle-for-subjectivity/) #[[church/theology]] #[[inoreader]]

Excerpt:: In discussions with communist scholars of religion in Beijing a few years ago, I found that they had a keen interest in liberation theologies, especially South Korean minjung theology, due to its social analysis and engagement.
